GK16udkass_u:1: asminbharatakhaṇḍe khalvadyāvadhi bahavaḥ saṃskṛtagranthāḥ saṃśodhya mudraṇadvārā prākāśyaṃ nītāstatra tatra paṇḍitaprakāṇḍaiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2: tathāpi katicana prājīnāḥ prabandhāḥ prakāśanārhā api pustakakośeṣveva nilīnā vartante /
GK16udkass_u:3: teṣāmanyatamo 'yaṃ kāvyālaṅkārasaṃgrahākhyaḥ prabandho yo 'dya mahatā prayatnena sahṛdayahṛdayavanodāya prakāśyate /
GK16udkass_u:9: atastatsabhāpaterudbhaṭabhaṭṭasyāpi jīvitasamayaḥ sa eveti viduṣāṃ nirṇayaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:10: udbhaṭācāryeṇa kumārasaṃbhavākhyaṃ kāvyaṃ tathā bhāmahakṛtālaṅkāragranthasya vivaraṇaṃ ca viracitamāsīditi jñāyate /
GK16udkass_u:11: atra pramāṇaṃ tu asyāṃ laghuvṛttau “anena granthakṛtā khoparacitakumārasaṃbhavaikadeśo
GK16udkass_u:13: ekadeśaśbada evaṃ vyākhyātaḥ“pṛ0 13 iti ca pratīhārendurājasyoktiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:16: laghuvṛtteḥ prārambhopasaṃhārayoḥ sthitābhyāṃ nimnalikhitapadyābhyāṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:23: pratīhārendurājasya jīvitakālastu niścitya vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GK16udkass_u:25: anena laghuvṛttau bhāmaha--vāmana---udbhaṭa---ityādi prācīnālaṅkārikāṇāmevollekhaḥ kṛtaḥ natu mahimabhaṭṭa-ānandavardhana-kāvyaprakāśakārādyabhinavālaṅkārikāṇām
GK16udkass_u:28: prophesara vināyaka sakhārāma ghāṭe ityetai saṃskaraṇārthe datvanṛgṛhīto 'smīti kṛtajñatayā
GK16udkass_u:51: atrānuprāse rūpake yathākramaṃ tridheti caturiti vacanaṃ vipratipattinirāsārtham /
GK16udkass_u:53: tathā rūpakasya ye catvāro bhedā vakṣyante tanmadhyādādyameva bhedadvitayaṃ prādarśayat /
GK16udkass_u:56: rūpakatvena saha ekasminnarthe vartamānā sattā rūpakedeṣvāvartamānā pratīyate /
GK16udkass_u:57: ataḥ pratīyamānā yāsau rūpakatvaikārthasamavetā sattātmikā bhavanakriyā tadabhyāvṛttāvayaṃ “dvitricaturbhyaḥ suc“(pā. a. 5.4.18)
GK16udkass_u:59: rūpakaṃ caturṣu bhedeṣu caturo vārān bhedātmanā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:69: anena ca yatra bhinnarūpe pade ekārthavadābhāsete tatpunaruktābhāsaṃ kāvyamalaṅkāryaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
GK16udkass_u:79: yatkāvyaṃ taddharmatvena punaruktavadābhāsamānayoḥ padayoralaṅkāratvamuktaṃ na tu svatantratayā /
GK16udkass_u:81: alaṅkārasya khalvalaṅkāryaparatantratayā nirūpaṇe kriyamāṇe suṣṭhu svarūpaṃ nirūpitaṃ bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:88: tadāprabhṛti satīviyogādārabhya sa devaḥ śitikaṇṭho niḥsaṅgaḥ san divasānatavāhitavāniti vakṣyamāṇe śloke vākyārthaparisamāptiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:92: viyogena janito yaḥ śokavahnistadudbhavā pīḍā yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:110: dvayordvayorajjhalsamudāyayoḥ suṣṭhu sadṛśe uccāraṇe kriyamāṇe sati chekānuprāso bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:112: dvayordvayoriti svārthe 'vadhāryamāṇe anekasminniti dvirvacanaṃ svārthagrahaṇena vīpsāyā nirastatvāt na yāvanto 'tra dvikāḥ saṃbhavanti teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva susadṛśatvaṃ kāryaṃ,
GK16udkass_u:118: anekasminniti vacanācca asakṛdevaṃvidharūpopanibandhe sati chekānuprāsatā na tu sakṛditi mantavyam /
GK16udkass_u:120: rasādyabhivyaktyanuguṇatvena labdhotkarṣā varṇāstatsamudāyā vā śobhātiśayahetutvena kāvye kṣiṣyamāṇā anuprāsaśabdenānvarthenābhidhīyante /
GK16udkass_u:123: teṣāṃ ca kulāyābhiratatvādanyena kenacidanāyāsyamānānāmanenānuprāsena sadṛśī madhurā vāguccarati /
GK16udkass_u:137: atra sadevadivasaśabdau indrakandaraśabdau gariṣṭhagoṣṭhīśabdau prathamapramathaśabdau pariupāsaśabdau ca dvau dvau ajjhalsamudāyau susadṛśāvṛccāritau tena chekānuprāsatā /
GK16udkass_u:146: triṣveteṣu yathāyogaṃ rasādyabhivyaktyanuguṇeṣu varṇavyavahāreṣuyaḥ sarūpāṇāṃ vyañjanānāṃ pṛthak pṛthagupanibandhastamanuprāsaṃ kavayaḥ sadecchantīti
GK16udkass_u:152: paraṣā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt hlahvahyādyaiśca saṃyutā // UKss_1.4 //
GK16udkass_u:160: toyāśayeṣu aśeṣaṃ sākalyena vyākośitāni vikāsitāni kuśeśayāni padmāni yayā iti samāsaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:161: tathā śālīnāṃ dhānyānāṃ kiṃśārubhiḥ śūkaiḥ kapiśāni piñjarāṇi āśāmukhāni digavakāśā yasyāmiti samāsaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:165: sparśairyutāṃ ca manyante upanāgarikāṃ budhāḥ // UKss_1.5 //
GK16udkass_u:166: sarūpāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ ye saṃyogāḥ kkappacca ityādayastairyuktā /
GK16udkass_u:167: tathā vargāntyair ṅañaṇanamaiḥ ṅkañcaṇṭantampa-ityādirūpatayā upari ye yuktāḥ kādayo makārāntāḥ sparśāstairyuktā upanāgarikā vṛttiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:168: eṣā khalu nāgarikayā vaidagdhījuṣā vanitayā upamīyate tata upanāgarikā /
GK16udkass_u:175: atra dakārākhyaḥ sparśo nakāreṇopari vyavasthitena yuktaḥ sārūpyeṇopanibaddhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:176: sāndrā ghanā aravindavṛndotthā makarandāmbubindava iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:177: sundaraspandaṃ spandibhiriti sāmānyabhūtaḥ spandaḥ sundaraspandamiti viśiṣṭena spandena viśeṣito raipoṣaṃ puṣṇātītivat /
GK16udkass_u:185: tasyā eva ca aparaṃ nāmadheyaṃ komaleti /
GK16udkass_u:196: tāsu ca rasādyabhivyaktyānuguṇyena pṛthak pṛthaganuprāso nibadhyate tadāha----
GK16udkass_u:202: śabdānāṃ vā padānāṃ vā lāṭānuprāsa iṣyate // UKss_1.8 //
GK16udkass_u:208: ubhayeṣāṃ ca śabdapadānāṃ svarūpasya varṇātmanaḥ abhidheyasya ca nirantaraśabdavyāpāragocarīkṛtasya
GK16udkass_u:213: ekaikasmin pade padasamudāyātmake ca pāde bhāvāt /
GK16udkass_u:218: atra hi svatantrapadātmakatvena dvayoḥ prayogādekaikapadāśrayo lāṭānuprāso 'bhihitaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:220: kāśāḥ kāśā ivodbhānti sarāṃsīva sarāṃsi ca /
GK16udkass_u:223: atra kāśādayaḥ śabdā aparaiḥ kāśādibhiḥ śabdai ekarūpā ekābhidheyāśca /
GK16udkass_u:225: tathā hyatra ekeṣāṃ kāśādiśabdānāṃ jātibhedoparaktadravyaparatayā prayogaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:230: padasamudāyātmakasya tu pādasya svarūpārthāviśeṣe tātparyabhedena punaruktau pādābhyāsaparipāṭyā svatantrapadāśrayo lāṭānuprāso bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:231: pādābhyāsakrameṇa ceti kramagrahaṇena sakṛddvistriśca pādābhyāse ye bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti tatsvīkāreṇa pādābhyāse lāṭānuprāsasya pravṛttiḥ sūcitā
GK16udkass_u:233: striyo mahati bhartṛbhya āgasyapi na cukrudhuḥ /
GK16udkass_u:234: bhartāro 'pi sati strībhya āgasyapi na cukrudhuḥ // UKss_1.*7 //
GK16udkass_u:236: tathā ca satyapyāgasīti bhartṛbhya iti strībhya iti ca 'krudha druhe'ti saṃpradānatā /
GK16udkass_u:237: atra ekatra pāde nāyakagatāparādhaviṣayatvena strīkartṛkaḥ krodhābhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:238: aparatra tu nāyikānāṃ yo bhartṛpraṇayātikramātmako 'parādhastadviṣayo nāyakakartṛkaḥ krodhābhāvobhihitaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:253: atra kamalaṣaṭpadamukharaśabdānāṃ svarūpārthabhede 'pi tātparyabhedena punaruktiḥ padadvitayāśrayitvaṃ ca /
GK16udkass_u:258: tathā pūrvaḥ ṣaṭpadaśabdo bhramaṇakriyāṃ prati kartṛtvenopavarṇitaḥ,
GK16udkass_u:271: atra nārīmukheṣviti vadanānāṃ candreṇopamitatvādasitotpalasya śaśakarūpatā dhvanyate /
GK16udkass_u:277: aparasya tu svātantryeṇa padarūpatayāvasthānaṃ tatra bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:291: svatantraparatantrāṇāṃ tasya pratyekaṃ dvibhedatvāt svatantrapara tantrayośca samuditayorekaprakāratvāt //
GK16udkass_u:294: guṇavṛtti pradhānena yujyate rūpakaṃ tu tat // UKss_1.11 //
GK16udkass_u:295: bandhastasya yataḥ śrutyā śrutyarthābhyāṃ ca tena tat /
GK16udkass_u:299: padāntarasya guṇavṛtterapareṇa padena yoge rūpakaṃ bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:300: nanvevaṃ sati nīlamutpalamityatrāpi nīlaśabdasya guṇavṛtterutpalaśabdena yoge rūpakatāprasaṅga ityāśaṅkyoktaṃ---śrutyā saṃbandhavirahāditi /
GK16udkass_u:302: tayā śrutyā anupapadyamānapadāntarasaṃbandhaṃ sat padāntaraṃ guṇavṛtti yatrāpareṇa padena yujyate tatra rūpakatā /
GK16udkass_u:307: atrāmbuśabdo nirantarārthaniṣṭhaśabdavyāpāragocarīkṛte udakatve vartamāno jyotsnāśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nānubhavati /
GK16udkass_u:309: ato 'mbugatāḥ śauklyāhlādakatvaprasaraṇaśīlatvādayo ye guṇāstatsadṛśajyotsnāgataguṇavṛttiḥ sannambuśabdo jyotsnāyāṃ vartate /
GK16udkass_u:310: tenāmbuśabdasya śrutyā nirantarārthaniṣṭhena abhidhāvyāpāreṇa yaḥ padāntareṇa jyotsnāśabdena saṃbandhastacchūnyatvādguṇavṛttitā /
GK16udkass_u:315: nanu viruddhārthābhidhāyinoḥ samānādhikaraṇayoḥ śabdayornirantarārthaniṣṭhena abhidhāvyāpāreṇa anupapdyamānānyonyasamanvayatvādyadyekasya lakṣaṇayā
GK16udkass_u:319: tadvajjyotsnāśabdasyāpi ambuśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyādguṇavṛttitvaṃ kathaṃ na syādityāśaṅkyoktaṃ pradhāneneti /
GK16udkass_u:325: nanu ca jyotsnāmbunetyatra ambunaḥ prādhānyaṃ jyotsnāyāśca guṇabhāvaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:327: etasmiñśloke tadbhāvādhyavasānena sekāvacchāditarūpatayā sekātmakatvena yāsau vyomno vyāptirasicyateti pratipāditā,
GK16udkass_u:328: tayā svasādhanabhūtaṃ yattadambho 'pekṣitaṃ tadatra jyotsnayā viśiṣyate jyotsnaivāmbviti /
GK16udkass_u:334: tatkathamidamuktaṃ jyotsnāpadasya prādhānyāttadvaśenāmbuśabdasya guṇavṛttitvaṃ kalpyate iti /
GK16udkass_u:339: tatra yadā tāvajjyotsnā amburūpatvamāpadyate tadā prākaraṇikatvāt jyotsnā pradhānam /
GK16udkass_u:343: yadā tvasau ambuśabda āpāditāmbubhāvajyotsnābhidhāyī san sekakriyayā samanvayamāpadyamāno
GK16udkass_u:344: yadetadatra sekasādhanatvenāmbu upayujyate tajjyotsnaiveti jyotsnayā viśiṣyate tadā
GK16udkass_u:350: rūpakatvaṃ cātrādhyāropyamāṇagatena rūpeṇa adhyāropaviṣayasya vastuno rūpavataḥ kriyamāṇatvādanvarthaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GK16udkass_u:351: atra copamānavartino ye guṇāstatsadṛśaguṇadarśanādupameya upamānagatayoḥ śabdarūpayorāropaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:356: ayameva ca pakṣo yukta iva dṛśyate /
GK16udkass_u:372: atra hi sarveṣāmeva rūpyatvenopāttānāṃ jyotsnendutārārātrivyomnāṃ yathākramamambukumbhakusumakanyodyānāni rūpakatvena svakaṇṭhenopāttāni,
GK16udkass_u:376: samagrāṇi hyatra rūpyatvenābhimatāni vastūni svakaṇṭhenopāttasya rūpakasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:383: taduktaṃ 'yataśca śrutyarthābhyāṃ tasya bandhastena tadekadeśavivarti ca'iti /
GK16udkass_u:391: atra dve rūpaṇe svakaṇṭhenābhihite picchālībālaśālibhiriti saronṛpā iti ca /
GK16udkass_u:392: tathā hi ekatra picchālyo bālarūpatvena rūpitāḥ,
GK16udkass_u:396: śarannāyikayā kartṛbhūtayā rājahaṃsacāmaraiḥ picchālībālaśālibhiḥ saronṛpā vījyante smeti hyatra vākyārthaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:398: yadi vā mālārūpakasya samastavastuviṣayatā tatra hyekasmin rūpye samuccayena asyante kṣipyante bahūni rūpakāṇi /
GK16udkass_u:409: atra bhṛṅgamālānāmeva kevalānāṃ rūpyatvenopāttānāṃ tisro rūpaṇāḥ kṛtāḥ vanāntadevatāveṇya ityevamādinā /
GK16udkass_u:411: ekasmin rūpye samuccayena bahūnāṃ rūpaṇānāṃ kṣiptatvāt-----
GK16udkass_u:419: atra prasādhyata ityayaṃ śabdaḥ śleṣacchāyayā dvayorarthayorvartate bhūṣaṇe upārjane ca /
GK16udkass_u:424: tasya ca parasyāprakṛtasya upārjanasya yattadrūpaṃ kārakakadambakaṃ yena tadrūpavatktrayate
GK16udkass_u:428: ekadeśavṛttītyatra hi ekadā andā īśaḥ prabhaviṣṇuryo vākyārthastadvṛttatvaṃ rūpakasyābhimatam /
GK16udkass_u:429: viśeṣoktilakṣaṇe ca bhāmahavivaraṇe bhaṭṭodbhaṭena ekadeśaśabda evaṃ vyākhyāto yathohāsmābhirnirūpitaḥ tatra viśeṣoktilakṣaṇam----
GK16udkass_u:443: ata eva caikadeśavartināmapi teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yau dvau upamānopameyabhāvena avasthitau vākyārthau bahabo vā tathāvidhāstaduddīpanahetutvāddīpakatā
GK16udkass_u:451: tābhyāṃ yogaḥ saṃbandho vidyate yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GK16udkass_u:458: atra saṃharaṇātmā dharmaḥ kadambakusumaśobhākarmakatvena virahiṇīsukhasampatkarmakatvena ca upanibadhyamāno 'ntargatopamaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:461: yathā preyoviyoginīnāṃ niḥśeṣāḥ sukhasampadaḥ saṃjahāra tathā kadambakusumaśriyo 'pīti /
GK16udkass_u:462: śaratkālaśabdasya cātra śaratsamayaḥ śleṣacchāyayā antakānurañcito vācyaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:464: atra ca prathama eva vākye saṃjahāretyasyopanibaddhasya dvitīyavākye anuṣaṅgacchāyayā upajīvyamānatvādādidīpakatvam /
GK16udkass_u:470: atra ca yātapatikājanadarśanaṃ duḥkhāya kevalamabhūditi madhyame vākye pravāsiduḥ khaikahetutvalakṣaṇo dharma upāttaḥ sannādyantābhyāṃ vākyābhyāṃ pūrvavadupajīvyate /
GK16udkass_u:478: ante ca sarvasukhahetutvamupanibaddhaṃ sat pūrvatra upajīvyate /
GK16udkass_u:481: nanu upamāyā 'upamā dīpakaṃ ca'iti pūrvamaddiṣṭatvāt yathoddeśalakṣaṇamiti nyāyāttsyā eva pūrvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam,
GK16udkass_u:501: kvacitsā karturācāre kyaṅā sā ca kvipā kvacit // UKss_1.19 //
GK16udkass_u:502: upamāne karmaṇi vā kartari vā yo ṇamulkaṣādagataḥ /
GK16udkass_u:503: tadvācyā sā vatinā ca karma sāmānyavacanena // UKss_1.20 //
GK16udkass_u:505: kalpatprabhṛtibhiranyaiśca taddhitaiḥ sā nibadhyate kavibhiḥ // UKss_1.21 //
GK16udkass_u:510: satyapi ca sādṛśyasaṃbandhitvenopādāne yasya prākaraṇikatvaṃ nāsti tasyopamānatvaṃ,
GK16udkass_u:515: tayorupamānopameyayoryatsādharmyaṃ samāno dharmaḥ tena dharmeṇa saṃbandho yaḥ sā upamānopameyayoḥ sādṛśyadvāreṇa sābhīpyaparicchedahetutvādupamā
GK16udkass_u:519: te ca mādhuryaujaḥprasādalakṣaṇāḥ yeṣāṃ tu guṇopajanitaśobhe kāvye śobhātiśayahetutvaṃ te 'laṅkārāḥ /
GK16udkass_u:525: upamānopameyabhāvaśca nātyantaṃ sādharmyeṇa upādāne sati bhavati gaurivāyaṃ gauriti /
GK16udkass_u:528: keṣāṃcitkhalu śabdānāṃ svārthe pravartamānānāṃ kālaḥ pravṛttinimittam,
GK16udkass_u:537: mithaḥ parasparaṃ vibhinnāḥ kālādayaḥ pravṛttinimittabhūtā yayoḥ śabdayostathāvidhau śabdau vācakau yayorupamānopameyayoriti bahuvrīhigarbho bahuvrīhiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:545: pūrṇā yatra catuṣṭayamupādīyate upamānamupameyaṃ tayośca sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ saundaryādirūpamānopameyabhāvasya dyotaka ivādiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:550: avyayaṃ hi luptavibhaktikatvena upamānopameyayorekataratrāpyaviśrāntatvādubhayorapyupamānopameyayorupamitikriyāviṣayatayā yathāyogaṃ karmakaraṇabhāvātmakaṃ saṃbandhamavadyotayati /
GK16udkass_u:558: tāṃ jānīyāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ
GK16udkass_u:572: taruṇya iva bhānti sma cakravākaiḥ stanairiva // UKss_1.*19 //
GK16udkass_u:574: yā tūpamā sadṛśādibhiḥ padaiḥ śliṣṭā tasyāṃ na śrautena rūpeṇa ubhayānuyāyitayā upamānopameyabhāvo 'vagamyate /
GK16udkass_u:591: pūrṇondubimbaṃ pratimā pratibimbaṃ sadṛśamasyeti bahūvrīhiratra kriyate /
GK16udkass_u:595: yadāpi ca pūrṇendubimbena pratimamiti tṛtīyātatpuruṣastadāpyupameye khakaṇṭhenābhihitaṃ sādṛśyam /
GK16udkass_u:611: yadā tvatra vākyopamā vivakṣitā bhavati tadaitadevodāharaṇaṃ tadudāharaṇārthatvena
GK16udkass_u:614: evameṣā saṃpūrṇā vākyāvagamyā dvividhopamā pratīpāditā śrautī ārthī ca /
GK16udkass_u:616: yā tu taddhitāvaseyā saṃpūrṇā tasyā api dvaividhyaṃ śrautatvārthatvabhedena /

GK16udkass_u:1250: asyāḥ kare muktāphalākṣamālāyāstadā upamā syāditi saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1251: atra rajanikarakarasaṃparke sati kamalasya saṃkocāvalokanādvikāśitvaṃ bahirasaṃbhavadapi kaviprajāpatinā pratibhopajanitena svavyāpāreṇa saṃbhavadrūpatayā pradarśitam /
GK16udkass_u:1253: tasya ca lokātikrāntagocarasyārthasya saṃbhāvanāyā nimittaṃ bhagavatīkarādhāratayā muktāphalākṣamālāvalokanam /
GK16udkass_u:1255: tatsajātīyasya padmasya vikāśinaścandrakarāṇāṃ ca yadyādhārādheyabhāvaḥ syāttadātropamānopameyabhāvo bhavediti saṃbhāvanā pravṛttā /
GK16udkass_u:1257: ekasmin khalu padārthe paridṛṣṭe anyasminnanavalokite 'pi tatsajātīyasaṃbhāvanā pravartate /
GK16udkass_u:1260: anena ca prakāreṇātropamānābhāvaḥ prakṛtasya vastunaḥ pradarśyate nāstyanyatkiṃcidasyopamānamiti /
GK16udkass_u:1261: ata eva saṃbhāvyamānatayārthasyopanibaddhasya nirācikīrṣayā yadiśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1264: yaccāniścitasadbhāvaṃ kavivedhasā saṃbhavadrūpatayopadarśitaṃ vastu tasya purāṇaprajāpatinirmitapadārthaviṣayāyā
GK16udkass_u:1268: manye ca nipatantyasyāḥ kaṭākṣā dikṣu pṛṣṭhataḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1272: kāryakāraṇayostu kāraṇasya naisargikaṃ prāgbhāvitvaṃ kāryasya tu paścādbhāvitvam /
GK16udkass_u:1275: paścādbhāvitatvena ca kāraṇasya kaṭākṣā dikṣu pṛṣṭhataḥ paścāt patanti agre smarabāṇaparamparā gacchantīti atra nimittaṃ (anu)
GK16udkass_u:1287: tatra hi saṃkhyopalakṣitakramānatikrameṇa śabdenānupātto 'pi padārthānāmanvayaḥ samāśrīyate /
GK16udkass_u:1289: sa cālaṅkāro bahūnāmalpaśo 'pyupanibadhyamāno yataḥ śobhābaddho bhavati ato bhūyasāmityuktam /
GK16udkass_u:1290: dvayorhi tasyopanibadhyamānasya yāvaccaturguṇatvādirūpatayopanibandho na kṛtaḥ tāvacchobhopetatvaṃ na bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:1292: tatra hi tasya dviguṇasya triguṇasya vopanibandhe śobhātiśayo jāyate /
GK16udkass_u:1294: taddviguṇaṃ triguṇaṃ vā bahuṣūddiṣṭeṣu jāyate ramyam /
GK16udkass_u:1295: yatteṣu pathaiva tato dvayostu bahūśo nibadhnīyāt //
GK16udkass_u:1297: nanu “mṛṇālahaṃse“tyādāvupavarṇayiṣyamāṇe udāharaṇe mṛṇālādibhya upamānebhyo bāhvādīnāmupameyānāṃ viśeṣakhyāpanādyvatirekālaṅkāreṇa sahṛdayahṛdayāṇyāvarjyante,
GK16udkass_u:1305: atra hi hariprabhṛtīnāṃ trayāṇāmuddiṣṭānāṃ kajjalaruktvasuparṇavāhanatvajalanidhisthatvādayo dharmāḥ krameṇānunirdiṣṭāḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1307: atha ca kramaparyālocanayā arthānāmānurūpyeṇa samanvayapratīteḥ śobhātiśayo vidyate /
GK16udkass_u:1308: tenāsya sādharmyādyabhāve 'pi pṛthagalaṅkāratāpratilambhādyatra sādharmyādi vidyate tatrāpyalaṅkāratvaṃ durnivāram /
GK16udkass_u:1317: nirjayantyānayā vyaktaṃ nalinyaḥ sakalā jitāḥ // UKss_3.*1 //
GK16udkass_u:1323: yatrevādipadanibandhaḥ sāmyasya ca rūpaṃ na vivakṣyate tatrotprekṣākhyo 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1335: tatra yaḥ siddho dharmaḥ sa guṇaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1339: atra asauprakṛto yor'thastasya ye kriyāguṇā anantaroktalakṣaṇāstadyogātsāmyarūpāvivakṣāyāmapi ivādiśabdapravṛttiravaraddhā /
GK16udkass_u:1340: yatra kilopamānopameyabhāvena sāmyaṃ tatropamānasādṛśyādupamānavartināṃ kriyāguṇānāṃ upameyapratītirbhavati /
GK16udkass_u:1341: utprekṣāyāmapi ca yo 'sāvasaḥ aprakṛtastasya ye kriyāguṇāste tasminnaprakṛte vastunyupamānatayānulliṅgite 'pi prakṛte vastunyāsajyante /
GK16udkass_u:1345: na hi vastvantaradharmā vastvantare samāsaktuṃ śakyā ityāśaṅkyoktam---atiśayānviteti /
GK16udkass_u:1346: purāṇaprajāpativahitarūpavaparyāsena kavivedhasā padārthasya guṇātiśayavivakṣayā rūpāntaramapyāsaktuṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1353: yeyaṃ lokātikrāntaviṣayā saṃbhāvanā utprekṣā sā bhāvasyābhāvasya cābhimānāt dvaividhyaṃ bhajata ityarthaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1362: tatra yā vācyā svakaṇṭhenevādibhirvaktavyā sā ivādībhirucyate /
GK16udkass_u:1368: tatra bhāvābhimānenotprekṣāyāṃ tasyā guṇayogādhyāsena pravṛttāyā udāharaṇam---
GK16udkass_u:1371: asyā mukhe japairhetubhūtaiḥ śyāmikāṅkena patitamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1372: atra japāsaktā bhagavatī arkamavalokayatīti tasyāḥ śaśāṅkasadṛse mukhe śyāmikā saṃjātā /
GK16udkass_u:1373: taccātra tasyāḥ śyamikāyā janma atiśayoktyā pātarūpatayā pratipāditaṃ patitamiti /
GK16udkass_u:1374: sā cātra śyāmika śaśilāñchanena śaśena tulyā /
GK16udkass_u:1377: yadetacchaśino lāñchanaṃ śyāmikārūpaṃ tadbhagavatīvadana indubhrāntyeva nipatitamiti /
GK16udkass_u:1380: evaṃ cātra śaśasadṛśī śyāmikā caitanyaśūnyatvena bhagavatīvadanamindubhrāntyā na gocarīkaroti /
GK16udkass_u:1381: atha ca tasyāḥ śaśabhāvamāpāditāyā indubhramalakṣaṇena cetanadharmeṇa saṃbandho nibaddhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1382: tenātra tasya vastvantarasya cetanasya yo 'sau guṇo bhramalakṣaṇastadyogādivādeḥ pravṛttiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1383: indubhramaśca bhāvarūpo guṇaḥ śaśīkṛtaśyamikākartṛkatayā kavinibaddhena vaktrā bhagavatābhimānenādhyavasitaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1389: atra kapolaphalakayostapovaśāt kṣāmatvamāpannayoḥ parasparādarśanamabhāvarūpaṃ sādhyatvāt kriyārūpakṣāmatāyāṃ kāraṇatayotprekṣitam /
GK16udkass_u:1395: bhṛgabālādeḥ svasamucite vyāpāre pravṛttasya ye hevākāḥ svajātyānurūpyeṇābhiniveśaviśeṣāstadupanibandhaḥ svabhāvoktiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1402: atra mṛgapotakasya mātaramiva vatsalāṃ bhagavatīṃ praṇayanirbhareṇa cerasā vyākulīkurvataḥ
GK16udkass_u:1403: svabhāvo nibaddhaḥ kṣaṇamaparidṛśyamānatvamardhakāyena parivṛttiḥ śṛṅgeṇa ca nodanamityevamātmā //
GK16udkass_u:1415: yathā udāttasya dvaividhyaṃ pramāṇopapannatvādaṅgīkṛtaṃ tathā śliṣṭasyāpi tadaṅgīkartavyamityarthaḥ //
GK16udkass_u:1423: ālasyaṃ caiva dainyaṃ ca cintā mohaḥ smṛtirdhṛtiḥ //
GK16udkass_u:1424: vrīḍā capalata harṣa āvego jaḍatā tathā /
GK16udkass_u:1425: garvo viṣāda autsukyaṃ nidrāpasmāra eva ca //
GK16udkass_u:1446: uddīpanavibhāvastu yadvaśena ratyādīnāṃ bhāvānāmatiśayena dīptatā bhavati,
GK16udkass_u:1451: yathā hi kāryasya suvivecitasya kāraṇaṃ pratyavyabhicāritā evaṃ kāraṇasyāpi suvivecitasya kāryaṃ pratyavyabhicāritā vyavahāre bāhulyena dṛśyate
GK16udkass_u:1453: vyabhicārī tu ratyādikānāṃ sthāyināṃ bhāvānāmavasthāviśeṣarūpo nirvedādiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1454: sa ca sahacāritvāt sthāyināṃ bhāvānāmavasthāviśeṣarūpo nirvedādiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1455: sa ca sahacāritvāt sthāyino bhāvānpratapādayati rathasyaikamiva cakraṃ cakrāntaram /
GK16udkass_u:1460: yathā khalvanubhāvādayo na svalakṣaṇatayā bhāvānavagamayanti apitu sāmānyarūpatayā tadvatsvaśabdā apītyāstām /
GK16udkass_u:1464: samastatvena vyastatvena ca yathāyogaṃ sūcanāni svalakṣaṇasvarūpāṇāṃ sāmānyāvasthāpāditānāṃ
GK16udkass_u:1468: evaṃ ca bhāvakāvyasya preyasvaditi lakṣaṇayā vyapadeśaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1477: imamiti idaṃśabdena parāmṛṣṭo yo mṛgārbhakaḥ sa ālambanavibhāvaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1488: bībhatsādbhutaśāntāśca nava nāṭye rasāḥ smṛtāḥ // UKss_4.4 //
GK16udkass_u:1489: ete ca śṛṅgārādayo nava yathāyogaṃ caturvargaprāptyupāyatayā taditaraparihāranibandhanataya ca ratyādīnāṃ sthāyināṃ navānāṃ bhāvānāṃ yaḥ paripoṣastadātmakāḥ
GK16udkass_u:1500: tādṛśa ityanena āsvādaviśeṣanibandhanatvaṃ śṛṅgarādiṣu tāntrikasya rasaśabdasyoktam /
GK16udkass_u:1501: eṣāṃ ca śṛṅgārādīnāṃ navānāṃ rasānāṃ svaśabdādibhiḥ pañcabhiravagatirbhavati /
GK16udkass_u:1508: eteṣāṃ ca svaśabdādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ samastavyastatayā āspadatvādyena kāvyena sphuṭarūpatayā śṛṅgārādirasāvirbhāvo darśyate tatkāvyaṃ rasavat /
GK16udkass_u:1524: saṃcāriṇaścautsukyacintāharṣāḥ svaśabdenonmīlitāḥ. svedaromāñcau ca sātvikau svaśabdopāttau /
GK16udkass_u:1532: rasānāṃ bhāvānāṃ ca kāvyaśobhātiśayahetutvāt kiṃ kāvyālaṅkāratvamuta kāvyajīvitatvamiti na
GK16udkass_u:1537: bhāvānāṃ ca rasānāṃ ca bandha ūrjasvi kathyate // UKss_4.5 //
GK16udkass_u:1540: tatra yatra śāstrasaṃvidaviruddhena rūpeṇa teṣāmupanibandhastatra preyo 'laṅkāro rasavadalaṅkāraścābhihitaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1541: yatra tu tadviruddhatvaṃ tanmūlakalokavyavahāraviruddhatvaṃ ca tadviṣayāṇāṃ rasabhāvanāmupanibandhe satyūrjasvikāvyaṃ bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:1542: tatra hi rāgadveṣamohakāraṇakā anaucityena rasabhāvā upanibadhyante /
GK16udkass_u:1543: ata eva tatra svakalpanāparikalpitatvena ūrjaso balasya vidyāmānatvādūrjakhivyapadeśaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1546: tathā kāmo 'sya vavṛdhe yathā himagireḥ sutām /
GK16udkass_u:1548: atra sakalalokātiśāyino bhagavato 'kṛtavivāhakamārīviṣayatayā haṭhasaṃgrahaḥ śāstrasaṃvidviruddhaḥ pravṛddharāgakāraṇaku upanibaddhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1550: tatra kāmo vavṛdhe ityayaṃ śṛṅgārasya svaśabdaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1552: śṛṅgārasya yāsau sthāyibhūtā ratistasyāḥ svaśabdaḥ himagireḥ sutāmityālambanavibhāvaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1564: yadavagamyate tatparyāyeṇa svakaṇṭhānabhihitamapi sāntareṇa śabdavyāpāreṇāvagamyamānatvāt paryāyoktaṃ vastu /
GK16udkass_u:1571: atra lambālakatvādayaḥ kāryarūpatvāt kāraṇabhūtaṃ gajāsuravadhaṃ vācyavācakavyāpārāspṛṣṭamapi gamayanti /
GK16udkass_u:1572: tena ca tathāvidhayā vicchittyā avagamyamānenārthena te lambālakatvādayor'thā alaṅkiyante /
GK16udkass_u:1577: iha rasabhāvānāṃ śāstrasamayāviruddhena tadviruddhena ca rūpeṇa dvaividhyamuktam /
GK16udkass_u:1578: tatra ye śāstrasamayāviruddhā rasabhāvāḥ te rasabhāvaśabdenātra
GK16udkass_u:1581: teṣāṃ rasabhāvānāṃ tadābhāsānāṃ ca yā vṛttiḥ svāśrayasaṃbandhātmikā tasyāḥ praśame nibadhyamāne samāhitālaṅkāro bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:1582: tatra hi teṣāṃ rasabhāvānāṃ samādhānaṃ samādhiḥ parihāro bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:1584: nanu yadi tasminkāvye rasādīnāṃ vṛttiḥ parihniyate,
GK16udkass_u:1586: anyasya rasādyantarasya ye 'nubhāvādayaḥ tairniḥśeṣeṇa śūnyaṃ rūpaṃ yasya tattathoktam /
GK16udkass_u:1587: yatra pūrveṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ vāsanāyā dārḍhyena teṣūpaśānteṣvapi rasādyantarāṇāṃ na svarūpamāvirbhavati,
GK16udkass_u:1591: atha kāntāṃ dṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā vibhramācca bhramaṃ bhrūvoḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1597: atra bhagavatā śṛṅgārasya ye 'nubhāvāḥ kāntadṛṣṭyādayasteṣāmavahitthena ākārapracchādanātmakena bhāvena tirodhānaṃ vihitam /
GK16udkass_u:1614: patanaṃ na tayā sārdhamāyāmastu prakaṭyabhūt // UKss_4.*13 //
GK16udkass_u:1624: bhūmeradhogamanādbhūmyāśliṣṭasya pradeśasya bhūmiviviktatvāddhimavataḥ kalpānte āyāmaḥ prakaṭībhūtaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1629: na kevalamṛddhimadvastūdāttaṃ yāvadarthaprāptāvanarthaparihāre codyatānāṃ vipulāśayānāṃ ceṣṭitamapi, taduktam----
GK16udkass_u:1631: na ca vipulāśayaceṣṭite upanibadhyamāne tasya śṛṅgārādirasapratipattihetutvādrasavadalaṅkārānupraveśo 'tra subhaṇaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1635: yatra ca rasāstātprayeṇāva gamyante tatra teṣāṃ vākyaviśrāntisthānatvena caturvargataditaraprāptiparihāropāyabhūtasthāyibhāvaparipoṣātmanāsvādyamānatvādrasavadalaṅkāro
GK16udkass_u:1642: atra himavataḥ sthairye vākyārthībhūte bhagavato varāhavapuṣastrailokyoddharaṇodyuktasya ceṣṭitaṃ vīrarasapratipattihetubhūtamavāntaravākyārthatvādupalakṣaṇībhūtam
GK16udkass_u:1650: iha khalu śabdānāmanekārthānāṃ yugapadanekārthavivakṣāyāṃ dvayī gatiḥ arthabhedena tāvacchabdā bhidyante iti bhaṭṭodbhaṭasya siddhāntaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1651: tatrārthabhedena bhidyamānāḥ śabdāḥ kecittantreṇa prayoktuṃ śakyāḥ kecinna /
GK16udkass_u:1652: yeṣāṃ halasvarasthānaprayatnādīnāṃ sāmyaṃ te tantreṇa prayoktuṃ śakyante /
GK16udkass_u:1653: yatra tu halāmekatvānekatvarūpatvātsvarāṇāṃ codāttatvānudāttatvādinā sthānānāṃ cauṣṭhyadantyauṣṭhatvādinā
GK16udkass_u:1654: prayatnānāṃ ca laghutvālaghutvādinā bhedasteṣāṃ tantreṇa prayogaḥ kartumaśakyaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1658: evaṃ cāvasthite ye tantreṇoccārayituṃ śakyante te ekaprayatnoccāryāḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1662: tathā ye teṣāmevaikaprayatnoccāryāṇāṃ śabdānāṃ chāyāṃ sādṛśyaṃ bibhrati tadupanibandhe ca śabdaśliṣṭam /
GK16udkass_u:1673: alaṅkārāntarāṇāmatra pratibhāmātraṃ na tu padabandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1682: na kevalaṃ tvaṃ himādrerevaṃvidhasya sutā yāvatsvayaṃ caivaṃprakāreti ca śabdaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1684: bhāsvantau dīptimantau yau karau hastau tābhyāṃ virājate /
GK16udkass_u:1688: asvāpaphalalubdhe hitapradetyatra tu bhagavatīpakṣe asvāpaṃ sukhenāptuṃ yanna śakyate phalaṃ tatra ye lubdhāstebhya īhitamīpsitaṃ pradadātītyarthaḥ
GK16udkass_u:1689: prabhātasandhyāpakṣe tu svāpasya nidrānubhavasya yatphalaṃ śramanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ tatra
GK16udkass_u:1690: yo na lubdhaḥ sandhyopāsanapravṛttatvāttadviṣayaṃ hitamadṛṣṭaṃ samarpayatītyevaṃvidhetyarthaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1693: uttaratra punarasvāpaphalalubdhe iti hitapradeti ca anayorbhinnapadatvānnānāsvaratvam /
GK16udkass_u:1699: asvāpeti akārasya phalalubdhe iti ca ekārasya ubhayoḥ pakṣayoryathāyogaṃ lāghavālāghavābhyāṃ prayatnabhedo 'pi /
GK16udkass_u:1707: śabdavyatirekeṇa tu sādhāraṇo dharmor'thādhikaraṇo 'tra na vidyate /
GK16udkass_u:1709: indukāntamukhītyatra bhagavatī candravatsundaraṃ mukhaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathāvidhā /
GK16udkass_u:1711: muktā parityaktā aśrīraśobhā yayā sā tathāvidhā /
GK16udkass_u:1713: tathā padmavat kamalavat rāgo lauhityaṃ yayostathāvidhau pādapallavau yasyāsatadrūpā /
GK16udkass_u:1714: yadā tvasau bhagavatī rūpakapratibhotpattinibandhanena śleṣeṇa trailokyodaravartimāṇikyasaṃbhārarūpatayā
GK16udkass_u:1724: apārijātavārtāpītyatra bhagavatyajātaśatrutvādapagataśatrusamūhavārtā tadīyā ca śobhā sarvasya cittamāvarjayatītyato nandanā śrīryasyāstathāvidhā
GK16udkass_u:1725: udakamadhyavartitayā ca yo 'sau apsu udake pratabimbita industadvatsundarī /
GK16udkass_u:1732: abindusundarītyatra tu bindubhiryasyāḥ saundaryaṃ nāsti tasyāḥ kathaṃ lāvaṇyabindavaḥ prasareyuriti virodhapratapattihetuḥ śleṣaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1754: etaddhi na tapaḥ satyamidaṃ hālāhalaṃ viṣam /
GK16udkass_u:1756: atra prākaraṇikasya tapasaḥ svarūpamapahnutya hālāhalaviṣaviśeṣarūpatādhyāropeṇa tatsādṛśyamavagamitam /
GK16udkass_u:1762: śaktīnāṃ kārakāṇāṃ sāmagrye 'pi avikalatve yaḥ kriyāphalasya kiñcidviśeṣamavagamayitumanutpatterupanibandhaḥ sā viśeṣoktiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1764: kvacitkhalu kāraṇasāmagrye 'pi yatkāryaṃ notpadyate tasyānutpattau svakaṇṭhena nimittamupādīyate,
GK16udkass_u:1767: tasyā bandho dvidhā lakṣye dṛśyate lalitātmakaḥ // UKss_5.5 //
GK16udkass_u:1771: tathāpi na sukhaprāptiḥ kasya citrīyate na dhīḥ // UKss_5.*2 //

GK16udkass_u:1780: nodeti kimapi praṣṭu satvarasyāpi me vacaḥ // UKss_5.*3 //

GK16udkass_u:1793: kavipratibhayā khalu purāṇaprajāpatinirmitaśuṣkaparuṣapadārthavilakṣaṇāḥ sarasāḥ padārthāḥ abhinavā eva nirmīyante /
GK16udkass_u:1796: yadvā māṃ kiṃ karomyeṣa vācālayati vismayaḥ /

GK16udkass_u:1799: kiṃvā karomi vismayavācālitaḥ san bravīmi bhavatyāḥ kvate /
GK16udkass_u:1801: atrākṛteḥ sukumārāyāḥ pāṭavasya ca kaṭhinakāyasādhyasya virodho bhagavatīniṣṭhatvenopanibaddhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1805: tathā dravyavirodhe guṇakriyāvirodhe guṇadravyavirodhe kriyādravyavirodhe ca //
GK16udkass_u:1809: aprastutānāmeva vā yatra sāmyamabhidhīyate sā tulyayogitā /
GK16udkass_u:1810: ata eva prākaraṇikāprākaraṇikobhayārthaniṣṭhatvābhāvāttatropamānopameyoktiśūnyatvaṃ prastāvabhāgbhiḥ prastutaiḥ sāmyābhidhāyi vaca iti saṃbandhaḥ
GK16udkass_u:1812: tvadaṅgamārdavaṃ draṣṭuḥ kasya citte na bhāsate /
GK16udkass_u:1814: tvaccharīrasaukumāryadarśinaḥ kasyeva cetasi mālatyādīnāṃ kāṭhinyaṃ na bhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1821: atra prākaraṇikānamapi yogapaṭṭādīnāṃ bhagavatīśarīre saṃsparśanaucityalakṣaṇaḥ samāno dharmo nibaddhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1827: adhikārādupavarṇanāvasarādapagatasya prākaraṇikādaparasya vastuno yatropanibandhaḥ sā aprastutapraśaṃsā /
GK16udkass_u:1834: atra kṛcchreṇa gantuṃ śakyate yasmindeśe tadgatakānanānāṃ śobhā aprākaraṇikya eva svadehajarjaratayopavarṇitāḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1840: yatra śabdānāmabhidhāyakānāṃ yā śaktirarthapratyāyanautsukyaṃ tasyā yaḥ svabhāvo niyatārthaniṣṭhatvātmakastena nindā gamyate iva natvasau nindaiva
GK16udkass_u:1851: atra yadetaddhigvādopahatatvaṃ rūpasaṃpadaḥ sākṣācchabdavyāpāreṇa spṛṣṭaṃ na tatsvātmaparyavasitaṃ,
GK16udkass_u:1860: yatra padārthānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ svayamanupapadyamānaḥ sannupamānopameyabhāve paryavasyati athavā upamānopameyabhāvakalpanayā svātmānamupapādayati tatra vidarśanā,
GK16udkass_u:1867: atra rajanikararahitavibhāvarīviśobhatvasya yadetatkarmatvaṃ tatkāminīkartṛkāyāṃ bharaṇakriyāyāṃ na samanvayaṃ gacchati /
GK16udkass_u:1872: yatra tu padārthasamankya upamānopameyabhāvakalpanayā svātmānamupapādayati tasya vidarśanābhedasyodāharaṇamudbhaṭapustake na dṛśyate /
GK16udkass_u:1877: tadupetasya śrīmataḥ prayojyakartṝn prati pātāvasānodayakarmake 'vabodhe tatsamarthācaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ
GK16udkass_u:1879: tathāvidhaṃ khalu bhāsvantaṃ paśyantaḥ śrīmanto budhyante bhāsvata iva sarvasyodayaḥ pātāvasāna iti /
GK16udkass_u:1880: tāṃścāsau tathāvabudhyamānān svāvasthopadarśanena prayuṅkte yathā mamāyamudayaḥ pātāvasānastathā bhavatāmapīti /
GK16udkass_u:1881: atra ca preṣaṇādhyeṣaṇayorabhāvāttatsamarthācaraṇalakṣaṇa eva prayojakavyāpāraḥ kārīṣo 'dhyāpayati bhikṣā vāsayatīti yathā /
GK16udkass_u:1882: tena ca prayojyaprayojakabhāvena svātmānamupapādayitumupamānopameyabhāva ākṣiptaḥ he śrīmanto yathā mamāyamudayaḥ patanāya tadvadbhavatāmapīti yūyaṃ budhyadhvamiti /
GK16udkass_u:1883: tenātra prayojyaprayojakabhāvalakṣaṇena padārthasamanvayena svātmopapādanāyopamānopameyabhāvasyākṣepāt dvitīyo vidarśanāyā bhedaḥ //
GK16udkass_u:1888: ekasya ca grahe nyāyadoṣābhāve ca saṃkaraḥ // UKss_5.11 //

GK16udkass_u:1905: yadi cānekālaṅkārollekhe sati saṃdehasaṃkarastata evamādāvapyanekālaṅkārollekhasya saṃbhavātsaṃdehasaṃkaraprasaṅga ityāśaṅkyoktam---samaṃ tadvṛttyasaṃbhava iti /
GK16udkass_u:1906: tasyānekasyālaṅkārasya samaṃ yugapadyadi vṛttirvyāpāro 'laṅkāryālaṅkaraṇātmako na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1907: pūrvokte tūdāharaṇe murārinirgateti sādhāraṇadharmopādānānnarakapratipanthinīti ca śleṣapadopadarśanānnānekasyālaṅkārasya yugapadvṛtterasaṃbhavaḥ
GK16udkass_u:1910: eva sati yatra pratibhāmātreṇānekasminnalaṅkāre ullikhyamāne yasya sādhakaṃ pramāṇamasti sa upādīyate /

GK16udkass_u:1912: tatrāṣyanekālaṅkārollekhasya samaṃ tadvṛttyasaṃbhavasya ca saṃbhavātsaṃdehasaṃkaratvaṃ prasajjatītyāśaṅkyoktam---ekasya ca grahe nyāyadoṣābhāve ceti /
GK16udkass_u:1915: yatrānekālaṅkārollekhe yugapadvṛttyasaṃbhave ca ekatarasya grahaṇe sādhakabādhake pramāṇe samastavyastatayā na vidyete tatra saṃdehasaṃkaraḥ
GK16udkass_u:1917: tathāhi---yatra sādhakabādhake pramāṇe sāmastyena vidyate tatra yasya sādhakaṃ pramāṇamasti tasyopādānādbādhakasya pramāṇopetasya ca tyāgādekasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:1919: tathā bādhakapramāṇopetasya parityāgāttditarasya ca pūrvollikhitasya pāriśeṣyeṇopādānādekasya graho bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:1924: tathāpi vacmi kutrāpi kriyatāmādaro nare // UKss_5.*10 //
GK16udkass_u:1929: na cātra dvayormadhyādekatarasya grahaṇāya sādhakabādhakapramāṇayogaḥ. sādhakaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ vidyamānaṃ vidhimukhenālaṅkāraṃ jñāpayet /
GK16udkass_u:1939: rūpeṇa te yuvā sarvaḥ pādabaddho hi kiṅkaraḥ // UKss_5.*11 //
GK16udkass_u:1945: tadanupapadyamānatayā saṃbhāvya tatsamarthanāyoktaṃ 'rūpeṇa te yuvā sarvaḥ pādabaddho hi kiṅkara'iti /
GK16udkass_u:1958: atropamālaṅkāra upamāpratibhotpattihetubhūtaśca śleṣa ityetau dvāvalaṅkārāvekasminvākyāṃśe ivaśabde 'nupraviṣṭau /
GK16udkass_u:1963: ambhojinyāṃ hi varṇā rājavartādayaḥ gauryāṃ tu gauratvam /

GK16udkass_u:1979: nātropamānopameyabhāve tātparyaṃ kintu etadeva dvayamevaṃvidhaṃ vidyate,
GK16udkass_u:1980: na tvanyadetayoḥ sadṛśaṃ vastvantaraṃ vidyate iti /
GK16udkass_u:1983: varaṃ viṣaṃ bhakṣaya mā cārasya gṛhe bhuṅkthāḥ itivat /

GK16udkass_u:1990: atra dhārṣṭyādi na muñcatīti yāsāvutprekṣā sā hareṇeva smaravyādhastvayānaṅgīkṛto 'pi sannityupamāpratibhotpattihetuśleṣavaśena svarūpaṃ pratilabhate
GK16udkass_u:1992: yaścānūrīkṛtaḥ kṣaṇamapi na muñcati tatra dhārṣṭyaṃ hetutayotprekṣituṃ śakyate /
GK16udkass_u:2006: nanu ca prākaraṇikaṃ sāmyābhidhānasaṃbandhi upameyam aprakaraṇikamupamānam /
GK16udkass_u:2007: yadi cātropameyasyopamānatvam abhidhīyate evaṃ sati tasya prākaraṇikatvam vyāhanyate ityāśaṅkyoktam -- pakṣāntarahānigāmiti /
GK16udkass_u:2008: nātropamānopameyabhāve tātparyaṃ kiṃtu etadeva dvayamevaṃvidhaṃ vidyate na tvanyadetayoḥ sadṛśaṃ vastvantaraṃ vidyata iti /
GK16udkass_u:2009: ataśca etat pakṣadvitayavyatiriktasya pakṣāntarasyātra hānervivakṣitatvāt parasparamupamānopameyabhāvo na duṣyatīti /
GK16udkass_u:2010: tasya pakṣāntarahānau pratipādyāyāmavāntaravākyārthatvenāvasthānāt -- varaṃ viṣaṃ bhakṣaya mā cāsya gṛhe bhuktvā -- itivat /
GK16udkass_u:2011: atra hi viṣabhakṣaṇaṃ na vidhīyate durjanagṛhe bhojanaparivarjanatātparyāt /
GK16udkass_u:2014: ājau karopamaṃ cakraṃ yasya cakropamaḥ karaḥ // UKss_5.*14 //
GK16udkass_u:2015: atra yasyetyupāttsya tvatkṛte so 'pi vaikuṇṭha ityatra tacchabdasamanvayenā kāṅkṣāvicchedo bhaviṣyate /
GK16udkass_u:2016: uttareṣvapi ca ślekeṣu tenaiva yacchabdārtho nirākāṅkṣī kāryaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2020: yadi parametayoreva parasparamupamānopameyabhāvaḥ syādanyatve tayorupamānaṃ nāstīti //
GK16udkass_u:2023: padenaikena kathyete sā sahoktirmatā satām // UKss_5.15 //
GK16udkass_u:2024: yatra vastudvayasamavete dve kriye padenaikena tantravṛttyā kathyete tatra sahoktirnāmālaṅkāro bhavati /

GK16udkass_u:2027: yatra sahādinā padena tulyakālatāmavagamya vastudvitayasamāśrite dve kriye kathyete tatra sahoktitvam /
GK16udkass_u:2029: sahādinā ca śabdena yugapatkālatāyāmavadyotyamānāyāṃ dvaya gatiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2030: kadācitkhalu yayoḥ kriyayostulyakālatā te kriye tulyakakṣatayā svāśrayaviśrāntatvenābhidhīyete,
GK16udkass_u:2031: yatā devadattyajñadattau saha bhuñjāte iti kadācittvekāśrayaviśrāntāyāṃ kriyāyāmabhihitāyāṃ sahādyarthaparyālocanāsāmarthyādaparasyāśrayasya kriyāsaṃbandho 'vagamyate,
GK16udkass_u:2032: yathā devadatto yajñadattena saha bhūṅkta iti /

GK16udkass_u:2035: evaṃvidhasya yatraiva śobhātiśayavidhāyitvaṃ tatraiva sahokteralaṅkāratā na sarvatreti draṣṭavyam /
GK16udkass_u:2040: atra mṛtyordyujanasya ca manorathāvāptikaraṇalakṣaṇe dve kriye padenaikenokte cakre 'vāptamanoratha iti /

GK16udkass_u:2042: athavā cakre iti karoti kriyā sāmānyabhūtā viśeṣamantareṇāparyavasyantī manorathāvāptilakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣaṃ garbhīkaroti /
GK16udkass_u:2046: yasya praiṣyeṇājñākāriṇā cakrasaṃjñakena kartṛbhūtena mṛtyunā sārdhamapṛthakkālatayā dyujana āptamanorathaḥ kṛta iti /
GK16udkass_u:2056: tatra yasyāḥ samor'thaḥ parivartyate tasyā anarthasvabhāvatā /
GK16udkass_u:2073: yatra tu nikṛṣṭenotkṛṣṭaḥ parigṛhyate tatrotkṛṣṭasya sukhahetutvenopādeyatvādarthasvabhāvatā /
GK16udkass_u:2078: atra urodānena utsāho lakṣyate yaścātra lakṣyamāṇāsyārthasyotsāhasyopāyatayā pratīyate /
GK16udkass_u:2079: abhidheyor'tho vakṣaso dānaṃ nāma yo hi yatra vakṣa udyamayati sa tatrotsahata iti tatpratibhāvacchāditasyotasāhasya pratitiḥ tadapekṣayā samena samasya parivartanam /
GK16udkass_u:2083: ratnairāpūrya dugdhārbdhi yaḥ samādatta kaustubham // UKss_5.*17 //
GK16udkass_u:2087: yo balau vyāptabhūsīmna makhena dyāṃ jigīṣati /
GK16udkass_u:2088: abhayaṃ svargasadmabhyo datvā jagrāha kharvatam // UKss_5.*18 //
GK16udkass_u:2091: atra abhayenotkṛṣṭena nikṛṣṭasya kharvatvasya hrasvatvasya parivartanaṃ abhidheyāpekṣayā
GK16udkass_u:2094: cattaddevebhyaḥ abhayaṃ pratijñātaṃ tadupāyabhūtāyā vāmanaveṣeṇa svarvatāyāḥ parigṛhītatvāt /
GK16udkass_u:2105: abhyarhitatvaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya dṛṣṭāntapratibimbitavyāptimukhena hetoḥ prāyeṇa gamakatā saṃpratyayāt /
GK16udkass_u:2107: upamānena tattvaṃ ca bhedaṃ ca vadataḥ punaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2108: sasaṃdehaṃ vacaḥ stutyai sasaṃdehaṃ vadurbudhāḥ // UKss_6.2 //
GK16udkass_u:2109: upamānabhedapūrvaṃ bhedamabhidadhataḥ kaveḥ kavinibaddhasya vā vakturvaca iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2110: saṃdehopetavacanavyājena upamānena tattvaṃ tadbhāvamabhedamupameyasyābhidhāyottarakālaṃ yadā tasmādupamānāttasyopameyasya bhedo 'bhidhīyate tadā sasaṃdeho 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2111: nanu upamānena saha pūrvamabhede 'bhihite sati punaryadi tasmāddhedasyābhidhānaṃ kriyate /
GK16udkass_u:2124: tathā kiṃ haṃsa iti punaścātropamānādupameyasya bhedo varṇitaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2140: yatra saṃdehābhāve 'pi saṃdehasyopanibandhe sati na pūrvavadupamānādupameyasya bheda upanibadhyate kiṃtarhyabheda eva saṃśayacchāyayā /
GK16udkass_u:2146: iti yaḥ śaṅkyate śyāmaḥ pakṣīndrerkatviṣi sthitaḥ // UKss_6.*3 //
GK16udkass_u:2147: atra meroruparivartī nīlo balāhakaḥ kalpāntavahnyāścayaśca dhūmaḥ ityetadubhayamupamānam /
GK16udkass_u:2149: tena ca upamānadvayena saṃdehavyājena bhagavānāpāditābheda upanibaddhaḥ kimayamevaṃvidhaḥ athaivaṃvidhaḥ iti /
GK16udkass_u:2156: yatra tenaiva na tu vastvantareṇa tasyaiva vastvantarasyopamānopameyabhāvo bhavettatra vastvantarānugamābhāvādananvayākhyo 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2164: rūpaṃ svamiva rūpaṃ ca lokalocanalobhanam // UKss_6.*4 //
GK16udkass_u:2165: atra vāṇīkriyārūpāṇāṃ trayāṇāmanupamatayā lokottaratvaṃ pratipādayitumātmanaivopamānopameyabhāvo nibaddhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2169: bahūnāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ parasparanirapekṣāṇāṃ dvayorvā tathāvidhayorekatra śabda eva artha eva vā upanibandhe sati saṃsṛṣṭiralaṅkāraḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2171: yatra ca śabdārthalakṣaṇāśrayadvitayaniṣṭhatayā anekālaṅkāropanibandhastatrāpi śabdārthavartyanekālaṅkārasaṃkara uktaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2175: apyadhārāṃ sudhāvṛrṣṭi manye tyajati tāṃ śriyam // UKss_6.*5 //
GK16udkass_u:2177: vareṇa saha tāruṇyaṃ nirviśantī gṛhe vasa // UKss_6.*6 //
GK16udkass_u:2179: atra śaśī uṣasi candrikāmiva vaikuṇṭhaḥ tvatkṛte śriyaṃ tyajati ityupamā /
GK16udkass_u:2181: tathā hyatra lakṣmyāḥ sarve pīyūṣavṛṣṭeḥ saṃbandhino dharmā vidyante kevalaṃ dhārāsaṃbandho
GK16udkass_u:2184: tadetasmin śloke upamāyā rūpakasya ca dvayoralaṅkārayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2193: ye tu sāpratikena prāgabhāvena upalakṣyante te bhāvinaḥ,
GK16udkass_u:2195: evamanantaropalakṣitāḥ bhūtā bhāvinaśca yer'thāste sāṃpratikapradhvaṃsābhāvaprāgabhāvaviviktatayā vartamānāyamānāḥ pratyakṣā iva yatra dṛśyante tadbhāvikaṃ nāmālaṅkāro bhavet /
GK16udkass_u:2200: tasyāṃ hi satyāṃ kaveḥ saṃbandhī yo bhāvaḥ
GK16udkass_u:2201: āśrayaḥ śṛṅgārādirasasaṃvalitacaturvargopāyabhūtaviśiṣṭārthollekhī sa kavinaiva sahṛdayaiḥ śrotṛbhiḥ svābhiprāye 'bhedena tattatkāvyapratibimbitarūpatayā sākṣātkriyate /
GK16udkass_u:2202: śrotṛṇāmapi hi tathāvidhasvacchaśabdānubhavadrāvitāntarātmanāṃ sahṛdayānāṃ svābhiprāyapratimudrā tatra saṃkrāmati /
GK16udkass_u:2203: ataḥ kaveryo 'sāvabhiprāyastadgocarīkṛtā bhūtā bhāvino 'pi padārthastatra sahṛdayaiḥ śrotṛbhiḥ svābhiprāyābhedena pratyakṣā iva dṛśyante /
GK16udkass_u:2204: yathā cātra śabdagatamanākulatvamanantaroktena prakāreṇa hetustathārthagatamapi citrodāttārthopanibandhahetukamatyadbhutatvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GK16udkass_u:2209: ata eva cātra kavisaṃbandhino bhāvasya śrotṛbhāvābhedādhyavasitasya puraḥ--sphuradrūpasya vidyamānatvādbhāvikavyapadeśaḥ bhāvo 'smin vidyate iti bhāvikam /
GK16udkass_u:2213: śrotā tatsāmyataḥ puṣṭiṃ caturvarge parāṃ vrajet“iti /
GK16udkass_u:2225: tenātra sāṃpratikapradhvaṃsābhāvopalakṣitatvādbhūṣaṇasaṃbandho vyatito 'pyadbhuto yo 'sau vapuḥprakarṣastadvaśena pratyatra iva kavinopanibaddhaḥ
GK16udkass_u:2227: saṃtatamutkṛṣṭatayā vaicitryeṇa īkṣaṇīyā ābharaṇaśobhā yasyāmiti bahuvrīhiḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2231: yatra ekaṃ vastu śrutaṃ sadvastvantaraṃ smārayati anubhāvayati vā tatra kāvyaliṅgaṃ nāmālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2233: vairasyamāvahanti na tathā kāvyehetuḥ atiśayena sarveṣāṃ janānāṃ yosau hṛdayasaṃvādīsarasaḥ
GK16udkass_u:2236: na khalu tacchāstraliṅgaṃ kiṃ tarhi kāvyaliṅgamiti kāvyagrahaṇena pratipādyate /
GK16udkass_u:2247: mādhuryaujasostu tattadrasābhivyaktyānuguṇyena tāratamyenāvasthitayoḥ prasāda eva sopayogatā /
GK16udkass_u:2248: evaṃ ca tatra tadrasānuguṇyena mādhuryaujobhyāṃ tāratamyenāvasthitābhyāṃ upakṛto
GK16udkass_u:2252: yadyevamidānīṃ guṇaireva kṛtakṛtyatvātkāvyasyālaṅkārāṇāṃ tatra nirupayogatā prāpnoti /
GK16udkass_u:2254: yathāhi laukikānāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ guṇasaṃskṛte yuvativapuṣi nibadhyamānānāmalaṅkāratā evaṃ kāvyālaṅkārāṇāmapi draṣṭavyam /
GK16udkass_u:2255: nanu nirguṇe 'pi kāvye alaṅkārāṇāṃ guṇavacchobhāvidhāyitvaṃ kasmānneṣyate /
GK16udkass_u:2257: na khalu nirguṇe kāvye nibadhyamānānāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ jaradyoṣidalaṅkāravacchobhāvidhāyitvaṃ dṛśyate /
GK16udkass_u:2259: jaradyoṣityalaṅkārāṃ nibadhyamānā na tasyāḥ śobhāṃ hīyate /
GK16udkass_u:2260: tathāhi---jaradyoṣityalaṅkārā nibadhyamānā na tasyāḥ śobhāṃ kurvanti,
GK16udkass_u:2261: pratyuta tasyāṃ nibadhyamānānāṃ teṣāmātmīyameva saubhāgyaṃ hīyate /
GK16udkass_u:2262: tathā kāvyālaṅkārāṇāmapi nirguṇe kāvye nibadhyamānānāṃ kāvyaśobhāhetutvābhāvaḥ svaśobhāhāniśca bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:2263: yadavocadbhaṭṭavāmanaḥ---“yuvateriva rūpamaṅga kāvyaṃ svadate śuddhaguṇaṃ tadapyatīva /
GK16udkass_u:2265: yadi bhavati vacaścyutaṃ guṇebhyo vapuriva yauvanavandhyamaṅganāyāḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2282: lakṣye ca alaṅkārarahitamapi kevalaguṇasaṃskriyamāṇaśabdārthaśarīraṃ kāvyaṃ dṛśyate,
GK16udkass_u:2283: yathā amarukasya kaveranibaddhaśṛṅgārarasasyandī ślokaḥ---“kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaprakalpatamaśrutam
GK16udkass_u:2288: nanu cātrāpi īrṣyāvipralambhavirahavipralambhaśṛṅgārābhyāṃ svatirodhānenopakṛtaḥ saṃbhogaśṛṅgāro nāyikāniṣṭho nibaddhastadyogācca rasavattvamalaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK16udkass_u:2289: tathāhi 'kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye'ityatra bhāge virahavipralambhapūrvakaḥ priyatamacittasāṃmukhyātmā saṃbhogaśṛṅgāraḥ sūcitaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2290: ssvalitottara iti tu saṃjātagotraskhalitatvātpreyaso nāyikāyā īrṣyāvipralambhaśṛṃgāro nibaddhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2291: punaśca virahakṛśayetyādibhistribhiḥ pādairavahitthena bhāvena nāyikādhāramīrṣyā vipralambhaśṛṅgāraṃ pracchādya saṃbhogaśṛṅgāreṇa cittollāsasūcitena vākyārthasamāptiḥ kṛtā /
GK16udkass_u:2294: dṛṣṭiparāvṛttyā sakhījanaśūnye gṛhe paridṛṣṭe yattannayakayā samullasitaṃ tadupanibandhātsaṃbhogaśṛṅgāreṇa
GK16udkass_u:2303: yathā hyātmādhiṣṭhitaṃ śarīraṃ jīvatīti vyapadiśyate tathā rasādhiṣṭhitasya kāvyasya jīvadrūpatayā vyapadeśaḥ kriyate /
GK16udkass_u:2306: rasābhivyaktiśca yathāyogaṃ mādhuryaujobhyāṃ tāratamyenāvasthitābhyāmupabṛṃhito yo 'sau prasādātmā guṇastena kriyate /
GK16udkass_u:2308: na tu kāvyaṃ prati alaṅkāratayeti yuktamidamuktaṃ niralaṅkāramapi kāvyaṃ saguṇaṃ dṛśyate iti /
GK16udkass_u:2309: evaṃ rasāntareṣu bhāveṣu rasabhāvābhāseṣu tatpraśameṣu ca vācyam /
GK16udkass_u:2316: vyākaraṇādau bharatādau ca kāvyavyapadeśo na prāptaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2325: guṇarahitaśabdārthaśarīre tu kvāyamātre kāvyaśabdasya kāvyasādṛśyādupacārātprayogo bhaviṣyati /
GK16udkass_u:2331: sarasapadārthaniṣṭhameva bhavatiṣa na tu nīrasavastumātraniṣṭhaṃ śāstraliṅgavadityupapannam /
GK16udkass_u:2333: kecitkhalu tārkakā vyāptigrahaṇakāle yadanubhūtaṃ vyāpakaṃ vahnyādivastu dhūmādervyāpyasya tatsmaraṇamātre dhūmādihetudarśanaprabuddhasaṃskārāṇāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ hetuvyāpāraṃ manyante /
GK16udkass_u:2334: apare tu vahnyādīnāṃ parvatādidharmaviśeṣasaṃbandhasya pūrvamagṛhītasya dhūmādihetuvyāpārasāmarthyena idānīmeva avaseyatvālliṅgasāmarthyālliṅgyanubhavasyaiva utpattimāhuḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2339: atra vibhūṣaṇavinyāsāspadabhūtā ye kaṇṭhādayastadavaśiṣṭānāmaṅgānāṃ yāsau kāntiḥ dīptiḥ tasyā anujjvalā malinā yāsau chāyā śobhā sā liṅgaṃ,
GK16udkass_u:2345: iṣṭasya prākaraṇikatayā pratipādayitumabhimatasyārthasya yatra vispaṣṭatayā pratibimbaṃ sadṛśa vastu nidarśyate tatra kāvyadṛṣṭānto nāmālaṅkāraḥ
GK16udkass_u:2348: tathāhi---atra rāmadevasya mārīcavadhe vyāpāro nirāyāso hariṇahananodyogikasarikiśorapratibimbitatvena nidarśitaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2352: atra hi pratibambādeva bimbasyonnayanādvispaṣṭarūpatayā iṣṭasyārthasya pratibimbanidarśanaṃ nāsti /
GK16udkass_u:2353: yatra tu iṣṭamarthaṃ svakaṇṭhenopādāya tasya pratibimbamupadarśyate tatra dṛṣṭāntatvam /
GK16udkass_u:2355: upamādāvapyetvaṃvidhasya rūpasya saṃbhava iti tannirākaraṇārthamuktam---yathevādipadaiḥ śūnyamiti /
GK16udkass_u:2363: nanu yatra kāvye sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinaḥ pradhānabhūtasya svaśabvyāpārāspṛṣṭatvena
GK16udkass_u:2374: atra hi rāhuvadhūratotsavasya yā cumbanamātreśeṣatā tatkarmakā cakrābhighātaprasabhājñākaraṇikā cakāreti karaṇalakṣaṇā kriyābhidhīyate / sā
GK16udkass_u:2379: tadviṣayasya ca kāvyadharmasya dhvananābhidhānasya vācyavācakavyāpāraśūnyāvagamanasvabhāvatvātparyāyoktālaṅkārasparś itvaṃ, taduktam----
GK16udkass_u:2381: nanu paryāyoktaśabdena prakārāntareṇa ucyamāntvātpratīyamānaṃ vastu abhidhīyate /
GK16udkass_u:2388: dṛśyate hi loke vyapadeśaḥ svāmyalaṅkaraṇakā bhṛtyā iti /
GK16udkass_u:2389: ato 'trāpi pratīyamānasya satyapi pradhānatve svaguṇabhūtavācyasaundaryasādhakatamatvādalaṅkāravyapadeśo na virudhyate /
GK16udkass_u:2390: yadi vā bhagavadvāsudevavartitayā yo 'sau vīraraso 'vagamyate tadapekṣayā tasya mukhyayaiva vṛttyā guṇabhūtatvādalaṅkāratā /
GK16udkass_u:2394: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe
GK16udkass_u:2395: vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava” //
GK16udkass_u:2399: na khalu pade paryāyoktena bhavitavyamitīyaṃ rājñāmājñā sūtrakāravacanaṃ vā /
GK16udkass_u:2405: tasmānna vastumātre pratīyamāne tadabhivyaktihetuḥ kāvyadharmo dhvanirnāmārthāntaram //
GK16udkass_u:2409: kṣobhaṃ yadeti na manāgapi tena manye
GK16udkass_u:2413: tathā hyatra śloke mukhyasya lāvaṇyakāntiparipūritadiṅbhukhasya vikasitahāsajyotsnasya
GK16udkass_u:2416: tathāvidhārthaparyālocanayā cātra mukhasya candreṇa rūpaṇā pratīyate /
GK16udkass_u:2418: na ca yasyālaṅkārasya pratīyamānarūpatā tasyehālaṅkāratvaṃ kenacinnivāritamiti pratīyamānarūpatayā rūpakākhyo 'laṅkāro bhaviṣyati /
GK16udkass_u:2423: bahulābhatvasya tatsadṛśasya yā lakṣaṇā taddvāreṇa garbhīkṛtopamānopameyabhāvā asaṃbhavadvācyārthā
GK16udkass_u:2431: tathā hyatra sarvaikaśaraṇamakṣayamityādīnāṃ śabdānāmarthabhedena bhinnatve sati yathāyogamekaprayatnoccāryāṇāmekapratayatnoccāryaśabdasadṛśānāṃ voccāraṇam /
GK16udkass_u:2441: tanvaṅgyā na tu pāritaḥ stanabharaḥ ṛṣṭuṃ priyasyorasaḥ” //
GK16udkass_u:2443: tathā hi--atra gotraskhalitasya śrutipathaprāpterīrṣyāvipralambhaśṛṅgāro nāyikāyāḥ saṃmukhībhūto 'pi saṃbhogaśṛṅgāreṇa svahetusāmagryapratilabdhaprakarṣeṇa tirodhāya pradarśitaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2446: punaśca saṃbhogaśṛṅgāreṇa vākyārtho nirvāhito 'na tu pāritaḥ'ityādinā /
GK16udkass_u:2450: yatrāpi bhāvastathā rasabhāvābhāsā rasabhāvatadābhāsapraśamāśca pratīyamānāstatrāpi yathākramaṃ preyasvadūrjasvitsamāhitalakṣaṇālaṅkārayogo vācyaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2452: guṇabhūteṣvapi ca raseṣūdāttālaṅkāraḥ pratipāditaḥ 'caritaṃ ca mahātmanām'ityādinā /
GK16udkass_u:2454: evaṃ ca trividhe 'pi pratīyamāner'the yacchaṣṭhānāṃ vyañjakatvamanantaropavarṇiteṣūdāharaṇeṣu ṣaṭūprakāratayopadarśitaṃ tasyokteṣvevālaṅkāreṣvantarbhāvādyvāptiḥ
GK16udkass_u:2455: ṣaṭprakāratā cātra trividhapratīyamānārthaniṣṭhasyāpi vyañjakatvasya vācyasya vivakṣitatvāvivakṣitatvābhyāmukta /
GK16udkass_u:2465: tatra yattāvadvācakaśaktyā śrayaṃ vyaṅgyabhūtālaṅkāraikaniyataṃ śabdaśaktimūlānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgayatayā sahṛdayairvyañjakatvāmuktaṃ “sarvaikaśaraṇamakṣayam“ityādau,
GK16udkass_u:2466: tatra śabdaśaktyā ye pratīyante virodhādayo 'laṅkārāstatsaṃskṛtasvabhāvaṃ vācyamavagamyete /
GK16udkass_u:2468: yattu vācyaśaktyāśrayaṃ “yāte gotraviparyaye śrutipatham“ityādāvasaṃlakṣyakramarasādivyaṅgyaniṣṭhaṃ vyañjakatvamuktaṃ tatrāpi vācyasya vivakṣitatvameva
GK16udkass_u:2470: tadevaṃ vācakaśaktyāśrayavyaṅgyabhūtālaṅakāraikaniyate vācyaśaktyāśraye cāsaṃlakṣyakramarasādivyaṅgyaniṣṭhe vyañjakatve vācyasya vivakṣitatvameva
GK16udkass_u:2471: vastumātrālaṅkāraviṣayasya tu vācyaśaktyāśrayasya vyañjakatvasya pratyekaṃ vācyasya vivakṣitatvāvivakṣitatvābhyāṃ dvaividhyam /
GK16udkass_u:2472: tathāhi 'cakrābhighātaprasabhājñaye'tyādau vastuviṣaye vyañjakatve vācyasya vivakṣitatvaṃ kāryavivakṣāpūrvakatvena kāraṇapratītiprasavāt /
GK16udkass_u:2481: upameyasya bahulābhatvasya tatsadṛśasya yā lakṣaṇā tasyā atyantatiraskṛtavācyamūlatvāt /
GK16udkass_u:2487: yatra cāvivakṣā vācyasya vastuniṣṭhe 'laṅkāraniṣṭhe vā vyañjakatve tatra vyaṅgyarasāderjhagityavagamyamānatvādasaṃlakṣyakramatā draṣṭavyā /
GK16udkass_u:2489: ata eva ca sahṛdayairyatra vācyasya vivakṣitatvaṃ tatraiva vastvalaṅkārayoḥ pratīyamānayorvācyena saha kramavyavahāraḥ pravartitor'thaśaktimūlānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyo
GK16udkass_u:2491: yatra ca vācyasyāvavakṣā pūrvamuktā “rāmo 'smī'ti 'suvarṇapuṣpā'miti ca tatra vayamadhikāropetaprastutārthānubandhivastūpanibandhādaprastutapraśaṃsābhedatvameva nyāyyaṃ manyāmahe /
GK16udkass_u:2493: yattu pūrvaparyāyoktabhedatvaṃ 'snigdhaśyāmalakāntī'tyādau rāmādīnāṃ śabdānāmabhihitaṃ tadupakramamātrarūpatayā draṣṭavyam /
GK16udkass_u:2495: yatra khalu vācyavivakṣāpūrvakatvena arthāntaraṃ pratīyate 'cakrābhighāte'tyādāvudāharaṇacatuṣṭaye tatra paryāyoktabhedatā /
GK16udkass_u:2502: tadevaṃ vācakaśaktamūle 'laṅkāraikaniyate vācyaśaktimūle ca rasādiviṣaye vyañjakatve vācyasya vivakṣitatvaikarūpatvam /
GK16udkass_u:2503: vastvalaṅkāraviṣaye tu vācyaśaktimūle vyañjakatve pratyekaṃ vācyasya vivakṣitatvāvivakṣitatvābhyāṃ dvibhedatā /
GK16udkass_u:2507: yatra ca vivakṣitatvaṃ tatra vācyasya svataḥsaṃbhavitvātprauḍhoktimātraniṣpāditaśarīratvācca dvaividhyam /
GK16udkass_u:2509: ete cāṣṭau bhedā vācyasya yatrāvivakṣā tadviṣayābhyāṃ pūrvoditābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ bhe dābhyāṃ saṃkalitāḥ santo daśa saṃpadyante /
GK16udkass_u:2510: eta eva tu padavākyaprakāśyatayā dvaiguṇyaṃ bhajamānā viṃśatirbhavti /
GK16udkass_u:2514: yathā ca pradhānabhūte vyaṅgye eṣā vyañjakatā rviśatividhā bhavati,
GK16udkass_u:2524: vastvalaṅkāravācye dhvanau pratyekaṃ vācyaṃ vivakṣyamavivakṣyaṃ ceti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2526: śabdaśaktirasāspada iti vācyakaśaktasamāśrayaṃ rasādivyaṅgyaniṣṭhaṃ ca vyañjakatvamuktam /
GK16udkass_u:2531: kuśāgrīyabuddhīnāṃ hi diṅbhātra evopadarśite sati buddhivallī pratānaśatairnānādigvayāpitvena vistāramāsādayatīti //
